title: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six® Vegas
description: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six makes its next-generation hardware debut in the most dramatic installment of the renowned first-person shooter franchise to date. Kunitsu-Gami: Path of the Goddess Rainbow operatives take to the chaotic streets of Las Vegas as an escalating terrorist siege in ‘Sin City’ threatens to take world terrorism to new, uncontrollable heights. The future of global security hangs in the balance as you battle to defend classic Vegas locations and environments like Fremont Street, the Strip, and casinos. Experience Las Vegas like never before – through revolutionary next- generation technology as you work against the clock to keep one of the world’s most recognizable cities from utter devastation.

system_requirements.Supported OS: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
system_requirements.Processor: 3 GHz Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon 3000 (3.5 GHz Pentium 4 or Athlon 3500 recommended)
system_requirements.Graphics: 128 MB DirectX 9.0c-compliant, Shader 3.0-enabled video card (256MB recommended) (see supported list*)
system_requirements.Sound: DirectX 9-compliant sound card (PC audio solution containing Dolby Digital Live required for Dolby Digital audio)
